name: Ponk's Jam: The Tulip Thief
description:
Guess who’s back, dudes and gally?!
In an all new universe, Ponk is here to save the world of Obal from the threat of The Tulip Thief! In this Cuphead style, 2D platformer, you will meet many hilarious and interesting characters along the way to save the citizens of Obal. Embark on a huge journey through 6 crazy environments to retrieve the Artefacts from the 5 Beholders.
Will you be able to save your friends?


In this difficult, bullet-hell, platformer, perseverance is the key. There are 7 main boss battles for you to try and get through as well as 17 scenic and enjoyable levels. This may sound short but I challenge you to beat it as fast as you can because OMG this be a hard game. You will spend hours, and hours, trying to beat this challenging game!

The 6 Worlds of Obal are:
- Ponk Fields
- Sock Plains
- The Sky Desert
- Candyland
- Cruisin’ City
- The Goblin Caves

The 5 Beholders are:
- Calcius the Sock Guard
- Julie the Sky Watcher
- Sir. Candi IV
- Ike the Funk Master
- Gerkil the Goblin King


This time, use Ariel’s Abilities Shoppe and Barry’s Bizzare to choose from 6 different super abilities and 32 distinct hats to help Ponk style on these noobs. The abilities are almost like a super power and you can choose which one you want which is almost like a dream come true; who doesn’t want to choose their own super power?!
